paragraph.heading: 1EiffelVision 2 Samples
paragraph.paragraph:
Vision2 ships with a number of samples provided to demonstrate different aspects of the library. If you are a new vision2 user then it is suggested that you first compile and run the
/libraries/vision2/samples/widgets/index.html Widgets sample. This will demonstrate both the appearence and behaviour of the available widgets.

The other samples provided are listed below:
/libraries/vision2/samples/accelerator/index.html Accelerator - Demonstrates the use of an
/libraries/vision2/reference/interface/kernel/ev_accelerator_chart.html EV_ACCELERATOR .
/libraries/vision2/samples/cursor/index.html Cursor - Demonstrates how to modify the displayed
/libraries/vision2/reference/interface/kernel/ev_cursor_chart.html EV_CURSOR for an
/libraries/vision2/reference/interface/widgets/ev_widget.html EV_WIDGET .
/libraries/vision2/samples/gauges/index.html Gauges - Demonstrates different types of EV_GAUGE.
/libraries/vision2/samples/standard_dialogs/index.html Standard_dialogs - Demonstrates different types of EV_STANDARD_DIALOG.
/libraries/vision2/samples/viewport/index.html Viewport - Demonstrates EV_VIEWPORT.
